Articles.Content:
CAE is proud to present the newest jet fighter, the AF-123C. A heavy high speed two person fighter, this plane is the F-15 of the CAE Air Force with the AF-19 acting as the F-16. This jet is highly monerverable and able to do complex monervers. Plus built in RCS allows for easy taxing. Built for Air Supiorority it will do anything and everything. Here is it in action.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

As you can see the layout is very untraditional. That is mainly for looks and has nothing to do with speed or agility. Anyways, not quite best of all, the take off is less than 250 meters! The plane has no special flight procedere so the worst of pilots can fly it. The only thing is you have to do is drop the tanks and put it in 1/3 throttle for best turning.

Hope you have fun flying it

Download https://www./?s3gux99z9xgvvvl

PS sorry for any spelling mistakes

It's a clever design

Clever!? I will take that.
